Description.Text:
Property Location
Aparthotel Parque La Paz is in the heart of Arona, walking distance from Arona Pyramid and Las Vistas Beach. This family-friendly aparthotel is within close proximity of Los Cristianos Beach and Veronicas Strip.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 221 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private patios. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and separate sitting areas.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and an arcade/game room. Additional amenities include tour/ticket assistance and barbecue grills.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at one of the aparthotel's 2 restaurants. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include multilingual staff and an elevator (lift). Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at one of the aparthotel's 2 restaurants. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Arona Pyramid - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Las Vistas Beach - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Los Cristianos Beach - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Veronicas Strip - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Golf Las Americas - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Troya Beach - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Magma Art and Congress Centre - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Siam Park - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Torviscas Beach - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Puerto Colon - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Aqualand Costa Adeje - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Bobo Beach - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Gran Sur Shopping Center - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Del Duque Beach - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Camel Park - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Parque La Paz is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 14.9 km / 9.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Parque La Paz is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 14.9 km / 9.2 mi.
